title: Font ID Mille Miglia Logo
content:
Hi,

may someone can identify this font.

Thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1000Miglia.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162232/http:/typophile.com/files/1000Miglia.jpg) | 619.29 KB |

 [‹ Conway´s Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162232/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45974 "Go to previous forum topic") [Events & Entertainment rigid sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162232/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39434 "Go to next forum topic")
author: typesterone

comments.content:
Hi Typester,

I’d say this is a custom job, and definitely not my favourite one.  
The closest font I can think of (with such a ‘G’ and the middle vertex of the M above the baseline) is [Martin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162232/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/martin_gothic_bold_ot_std_urw/?sample_text=1000%20MIGLIA).  
F
Its an italian Job. Italian typography is sometimes very .... :-)
